text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes people are drinking disinfectants & now have lung damage while your eating a cheeseburger. Please go golf & leave this to the adults. I stand with the NYT. Why don’t you come to the hospitals in NY you know where people are dying because you thought there was no Coronavirus.
